Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia

Description: Alawwal Bank (known as: Alawwal) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Alawwal operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has 5 subsidiaries operating across Saudi Arabia. Alawwal is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1976.
